title: The Maze
description: Learn hjkl and basic mode switching.
objective: Navigate to the exit and escape.
quote:
Every expert was once a beginner.
Every master was once a disaster.

Today, you take your first steps.
victory_quote:
Well done, soldier. You've taken your
first steps toward freedom.

But don't celebrate yet. The real
challenges lie ahead.
lore:
"You survived the training course.
 Good. But that was just a warm-up.

 This maze... it's different. The walls
 twist and turn. Dead ends everywhere.
 One wrong move and you'll be walking
 in circles for hours.

 I've seen soldiers with years of
 experience get lost in these corridors.
 They forget the basics. Start second-
 guessing every keystroke.

 Stay calm. Trust your movements.
 h, j, k, l — they haven't failed
 you yet.

 Find the exit. Prove you're ready
 for what comes next."

                    — The Commander
